name: The Space Ship
description:
This is a prototype game that I made to see if I could make a game without following a tutorial on YouTube.

I think it turned out pretty well!

I'm sure the game has bugs. Please report them in the comments of this game.

THE SPACE SHIP

This is a simple game where you have to clear the space ship from bad, well... Spaceships... Have fun! More levels REALLY soon! :)
